name: thedailybeast
text:
Mr. Rogers' widow, Joanne, told The Daily Beast that Fred always avoided talking about politics for fear it would complicate the lives of kids at home.

But Joanne had no problem making her feelings about Trump clear: “I think he’s just a horrible person.” https://t.co/cWud6EMqzQ
